title: Ticket
body:
I made a ticket with account recovery , and we have not received any email message , how can I see my ticket , I maintain that I put the correct email .
A LITTLE HELP

replies.body:
From looking into this, it appears that your ticket was escalated to an Account Recovery Specialist after one of our automated tools checked to see if you provided enough information to simply instantly give you access to the account.  The Specialist should be responding to your ticket in the near future with some additional information you can provide to verify that you are the original owner.

I hope this helps!  Let me know if you have any further questions!

How have to wait account being permanently banned ? I am on weekends, I get bored , people taken raft , I was banned without reason , and I have worked hard on that account, give you me a message with the ticket and what to do soon , you said not long , however afterwards I have to go to school ...
